H0.text: An asteroid revolves around a planet.

H1.text: A star revolves around a planet.

H2.text: A comet is a celestial body that revolves around a planet.

H3.text: A moon revolves around a planet.

A4.text: The Moon orbits around Earth at an average distance of 384,399 kilometres (238,854 mi).

A5.text: The Moon makes a complete orbit around Earth with respect to the fixed stars, its sidereal period, about once every 27.3 days.
